subject: Re: spook radio with iron exploring wire...play on words?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
No, I think the part that souded like diode on the tape was "I have--
shot...", cuz right after that there is s fainter statement "bring 
death to president" that I didn't hear until I copied it to the 
computer. Usually when I digitize these I lose stuff, but sometimes 
more comes out. 

 Frank


 --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, rainspirit1@... wrote:
>
> Maybe it was really, "use a diode to get your link in...or link 
on"....
> Just a thought.  
> ~ Laura
